channel.title: Not a bug - More of a request: Undo the UC music changes
channel.description:
I'm sure you guys saw this coming and nothing will change your mind. but please, again:
1) Revert the latest musical changes to Unforeseen Consequences or make them optional 2) Remove the butt-slide mechanic from Gordon unless the LJM is equipped or make it optional
That is all.
I am sure other forum members will let you know they agree with me.
Thank you, Sersoft.corp

item.title: Not a bug - More of a request: Undo the UC music changes
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
My quote from elsewhere, specifically r.e. the music on the headcrab elevator:

Huh yeah, that music really doesn’t fit there, does it. It’s bleak revelation music, and going down the darkly silly headcrab slide isn’t really a bleakly relevatory moment either in the original or in Black Mesa.
